question: What will the following code print if x = 3, y = 5, and z = 2?

answers.feedback: While the value in x is less than the value in y (3 is less than 5) it is not less than the value in z (3 is not less than 2).
The value in y is not less than the value in x (5 is not less than 3).
Since the first two Boolean expressions are false the else will be executed.
